__e: So then he said if his parents rejected our union, we'd die together.
Then he suggested that we play a game for the check.
I suggested we go to the police.
Well, there were peculiar circumstances, and I didn't know what to do for the best. It hardly seemed a matter for the police. So I talked to the wife about it, and she suggested I come and see you.
My brother suggested I might like this blog. He was entirely right.
As the Sovereign has no further need for my services tonight, she suggested I spend some time with you.
As the Sovereign has no further need for my services tonight, she suggested I spend some time with you.
It's been suggested that you have received messages from the robot... but are keeping dark about them for security reasons.
I've written to her mother and suggested that- much as I regret it- it would be wise to take her home.
When I suggested he see the police surgeon... he'd make excuses.
It was then I suggested that he played the death game.
The reason I've suggested you come here is... because I've borrowed this painting from the house.
And, er... Well, she was the one who actually suggested that he was crazy.
Yes. Tell her what happened... and that I suggested the boy spend the night... at his grandmother's house.
39% of employees suggested that there is not enough collaboration happening within their own office.
I was suggested this blog by my cousin.
This was the first place suggested by my data banks.
Yes, I believe I'll start as you've so often suggested by eating your shorts.
WARNING: The suggested age to use this product is of 8 years or over.
(Suggested time for this meditation is 20 minutes.)
